Long Straddle.Investor View: Neutral Direction but expecting large volatility in underlying movement

Put Straddle.Investor View: Neutral Direction but expecting little volatility in underlying movement

Bull Call Spread.Breakeven: Strike price of Buy call + net premium paid

Bull Put Spread.Breakeven: Strike price of Short Put - premium received

Bear Call Spread.Reward: Limited to the net premium received
Bear Call Spread.Breakeven: Strike price of Short Call + premium received

Bear Put Spread.Breakeven: Strike price of Long Put - net premium paid

Call Backspread.Investor View: Bullish on direction as well as volatility of the Stock/Index
Call Backspread.Risk: Limited to difference between two Strikes ± net premium paid/received
Call Backspread.Reward: Unlimited on upside and limited on downside
Call Backspread.Breakeven: Strike price of Long Call + Strike Price of Long call ± net premium paid/received. In case of net inflow of premium, one more breakeven point = Strike price of Short Call + net premium received

Put Backspread.Investor View: Bearish on direction and bullish on volatility of the Stock/Index
Put Backspread.Risk: Limited to the difference in Strike price of Short Put - Strike price of Long Put ± net premium paid/received
Put Backspread.Reward: Unlimited on upside and limited on downside
Put Backspread.Breakeven: Strike price of Long Put + Strike price of Long Put - Strike price of Short Put ± net premium received/paid. In case of net inflow of premium there is one more breakevent point = Strike price of Short Put + net premium received

Long Combo.Breakeven: Strike price of Long Call + net premium paid (in case there is outflow) or Strike price of Short Put - net premium received (in case there is inflow)

Long Strangle.Investor View: Neutral on direction but bullish on volaitlity of the Stock/Index
Long Strangle.Breakeven: Buy Call Strike price + net premium paid
